type: Legendary Creature – Human Dragon Shapeshifter Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Devout Conqueror[/i] – Other Nobles you control have deathtouch.
[i]Nohrian Trust[/i] – If a creature you control dying would cause an ability of a permanent you control to trigger, it triggers an additional time.
[i]Dragon Stone[/i] – {4}{W}{B}: Put two +1/+1 counters on Corrin. She gains trample until end of turn.
